page.title: 03TUCKTONIA PARK, CHRISTCHURCH
page.content: TUCKTONIA IS A LEISURE PARK FOR ALL THE FAMILY TO ENJOY THEMSELVES AND TO HAVE A LOT OF FUN.THERE ARE FOUR DIFFERENT SECTIONS IN TUCKTONIA, THERE ARE THE MACHINES, THE MODEL VILLAGE, THE OUTSIDE AMUSEMENT PARK AND THE CAFETERIA WHERE YOU CAN GET DRINKS, HOT MEALS AND SNACKS. IN THE MAIN BUILDING THERE IS A TOILET BLOCK, A GIFT SHOP AND AN INFORMATION DESK. GREAT LITTLE BRITAIN IS ANOTHER NAME FOR THE MODEL VILLAGE. THERE ARE MANY MODELS THERE, ALL INTERESTING AND THE TALLEST IS THE NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK. THERE ARE LOTS OF OTHER MODELS SUCH AS A CORNISH FISHING VILLAGE, BURNS COTTAGE, BISHOP ROCK LIGHTHOUSE, WINDSOR CASTLE, POST OFFICE TOWER, ST PAULS CATHEDRAL AND BUCKINGHAM PALACE.IT CAN BE AN EXCITING PLACE FOR ALL THE FAMILY.
